typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{SALE COUNTRY} as string,
		VEH_SOURCE as string,
		{IMPORT / DOMESTIC} as string,
		{Mnemonic Only} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Mnemonic - Vehicle/Country or MCODE} as string,
		TCODE as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Sales Parent or GROUP} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Car/Truck or MACRO LEVEL SEGMENT} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Sub-Segment or MODIFIED SEGMENT} as string,
		{Regional Segment  Concat or DRI SEGMENT} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Platform} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Brand} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Nameplate or MODEL} as string,
		TRIM as string,
		Electric as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Body Type or BODYSTYLE} as string,
		DOORS as string,
		DRIVETYPE as string,
		{LAST UPDATE} as date,
		SERIES as string,
		TYPE_F as string,
		{SECTION WIDTH} as short,
		{ASPECT RATIO} as double,
		{TYPE CONSTRUCTION} as string,
		{RIM DIAMETER} as short,
		{LOAD INDEX} as string,
		{SPEED SYMBOL} as string,
		FRONT_SIZE as string,
		CORE_F_SIZE as string,
		{CHECK INFO F TO B} as string,
		TYPE_R as string,
		{REAR SECTION WIDTH} as short,
		{REAR ASPECT RATIO} as double,
		{REAR TYPE CONSTRUCTION} as string,
		{REAR RIM DIAMETER} as short,
		{REAR LOAD INDEX} as string,
		{REAR SPEED SYMBOL} as string,
		REAR_SIZE as string,
		CORE_R_SIZE as string,
		{TIRE PARENT} as string,
		TIRE_BRAND as string,
		TIRE_MODEL as string,
		{Tire Category} as short,
		{Vehicle App} as short,
		Segment as string,
		{Reporting Segment} as string,
		{Tire Designation} as string,
		{AS / SUM / WIN / LRR  APPLIES TO OEM MARKETING} as string,
		SIDEWALL as string,
		{WHEEL TYPE} as string,
		{RUN_FLAT DETAIL  (INTERNAL TO TIRE)} as string,
		PRES_MON as string,
		MON_SUPP as string,
		{SPARE DETAIL  (EXTERNAL TO TIRE)} as string,
		{1998_VVOL} as double,
		{1999_VVOL} as double,
		{2000_VVOL} as double,
		{2001_VVOL} as double,
		{2002_VVOL} as double,
		{2003_VVOL} as double,
		{2004_VVOL} as double,
		{2005_VVOL} as double,
		{2006_VVOL} as double,
		{2007_VVOL} as double,
		{2008_VVOL} as double,
		{2009_VVOL} as double,
		{2010_VVOL} as double,
		{2011_VVOL} as double,
		{2012_VVOL} as double,
		{2013_VVOL} as double,
		{2014_VVOL} as double,
		{2015_VVOL} as double,
		{2016_VVOL} as double,
		{2017_VVOL} as double,
		{2018_VVOL} as double,
		{2019_VVOL} as double,
		{2020_VVOL} as double,
		{2021_VVOL} as double,
		{2022_VVOL} as double,
		{2023_VVOL} as double,
		{2024_VVOL} as double,
		{2025_VVOL} as double,
		{1998_TVOL} as double,
		{1999_TVOL} as double,
		{2000_TVOL} as double,
		{2001_TVOL} as double,
		{2002_TVOL} as double,
		{2003_TVOL} as double,
		{2004_TVOL} as double,
		{2005_TVOL} as double,
		{2006_TVOL} as double,
		{2007_TVOL} as double,
		{2008_TVOL} as double,
		{2009_TVOL} as double,
		{2010_TVOL} as double,
		{2011_TVOL} as double,
		{2012_TVOL} as double,
		{2013_TVOL} as double,
		{2014_TVOL} as double,
		{2015_TVOL} as double,
		{2016_TVOL} as double,
		{2017_TVOL} as double,
		{2018_TVOL} as double,
		{2019_TVOL} as double,
		{2020_TVOL} as double,
		{2021_TVOL} as double,
		{2022_TVOL} as double,
		{2023_TVOL} as double,
		{2024_TVOL} as double,
		{2025_TVOL} as double,
		{Updated Segment} as string,
		{Updated Bodytype} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Segment} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Price Class} as string,
		{Global Sales Segment} as string,
		{Global Sales Sub-segment} as string,
		{Global Sales Price Class} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Program} as string,
		{RUN_FLAT SIMPL} as string,
		{SPARE TIRE SIMPL} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OESrc1
source(output(
		OETireSize as string,
		LoadRange as string,
		Date_Updated as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
OESrc1 derive({Load Range} = 'tbd',
		{Tire Size to Lookup} = TYPE_F+CORE_F_SIZE+' '+{LOAD INDEX},
		{Timestmap of Data} = currentUTC(),
		{Timestamp TimeZone} = 'EST',
		{Vehicle Model Year} = '2020',
		{Tire Volume} = 13548,
		{Tire Position} = 'Front and Rear',
		{Vehicle Sales Volume} = 13452) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, source1 lookup({Tire Size to Lookup} == OETireSize,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		{SALE COUNTRY},
		VEH_SOURCE,
		{IMPORT / DOMESTIC},
		{Mnemonic Only},
		{Vehicle Sales: Mnemonic - Vehicle/Country or MCODE},
		TCODE,
		{Vehicle Sales: Sales Parent or GROUP},
		{Vehicle Sales: Car/Truck or MACRO LEVEL SEGMENT},
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Sub-Segment or MODIFIED SEGMENT},
		{Regional Segment  Concat or DRI SEGMENT},
		{Vehicle Sales: Platform},
		{Vehicle Sales: Brand},
		{Vehicle Sales: Nameplate or MODEL},
		TRIM,
		Electric,
		{Vehicle Sales: Body Type or BODYSTYLE},
		DOORS,
		DRIVETYPE,
		{LAST UPDATE},
		SERIES,
		TYPE_F,
		{SECTION WIDTH},
		{ASPECT RATIO},
		{TYPE CONSTRUCTION},
		{RIM DIAMETER},
		{LOAD INDEX},
		{SPEED SYMBOL},
		FRONT_SIZE,
		CORE_F_SIZE,
		{CHECK INFO F TO B},
		TYPE_R,
		{REAR SECTION WIDTH},
		{REAR ASPECT RATIO},
		{REAR TYPE CONSTRUCTION},
		{REAR RIM DIAMETER},
		{REAR LOAD INDEX},
		{REAR SPEED SYMBOL},
		REAR_SIZE,
		CORE_R_SIZE,
		{TIRE PARENT},
		TIRE_BRAND,
		TIRE_MODEL,
		{Tire Category},
		{Vehicle App},
		Segment,
		{Reporting Segment},
		{Tire Designation},
		{AS / SUM / WIN / LRR  APPLIES TO OEM MARKETING},
		SIDEWALL,
		{WHEEL TYPE},
		{RUN_FLAT DETAIL  (INTERNAL TO TIRE)},
		PRES_MON,
		MON_SUPP,
		{SPARE DETAIL  (EXTERNAL TO TIRE)},
		{Updated Segment},
		{Updated Bodytype},
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Segment},
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Price Class},
		{Global Sales Segment},
		{Global Sales Sub-segment},
		{Global Sales Price Class},
		{Vehicle Sales: Program},
		{RUN_FLAT SIMPL},
		{SPARE TIRE SIMPL},
		{Load Range},
		{Tire Size to Lookup},
		{Timestmap of Data},
		{Timestamp TimeZone},
		{Vehicle Model Year},
		{Tire Volume},
		{Tire Position},
		{Vehicle Sales Volume},
		OETireSize,
		LoadRange,
		Date_Updated
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
